description: [``botocore``] Amazon EC2 I4i instances are powered by 3rd generation Intel Xeon Scalable processors and feature up to 30 TB of local AWS Nitro SSD storage
[``botocore``] AWS Kendra now supports hierarchical facets for a query. For more information, see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/kendra/latest/dg/filtering.html
[``botocore``] AWS IoT Jobs now allows you to create up to 100,000 active continuous and snapshot jobs by using concurrency control.
[``botocore``] AWS DataSync now supports a new ObjectTags Task API option that can be used to control whether Object Tags are transferred.
